cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.0.2)
project (cryptolens_examples)

# Since we are adding the parent directory we need to provide a
# the name "cryptolens-cpp" for the folder generated by CMake. In case
# one adds cryptolens-cpp as a proper subdirectory to a project this is not
# necessary and it is sufficient to do something like:
#
#    add_subdirectory ("cryptolens-cpp")

add_subdirectory ("../.." "cryptolens-cpp")

add_executable(example1 example1.cpp)
target_link_libraries(example1 cryptolens)
set_property(TARGET example1 PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 17)
set_property(TARGET example1 PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD_REQURED ON)

add_executable(example2 example2.cpp)
target_link_libraries(example2 cryptolens)
set_property(TARGET example2 PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 17)
set_property(TARGET example2 PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD_REQURED ON)

add_executable(example3 example3.cpp)
target_link_libraries(example3 cryptolens)
set_property(TARGET example3 PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 17)
set_property(TARGET example3 PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD_REQURED ON)

add_executable(example4 example4.cpp)
target_link_libraries(example4 cryptolens)
set_property(TARGET example4 PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 17)
set_property(TARGET example4 PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD_REQURED ON)
